title: The reason this game is in a bad state
body:
Jg: Think they are entitled to get a kill every time they gank or think they are entitled to powerfarming all game to the point they can 1v5
Adc: Think they are entitled to being the strongest damage dealer at all phases of the game
Top: Think they are entitled to winning laning phase every game
Mid: Think they are entitled to being the best player on the team simply because they have the safest lane
Support: Think they are entitled to doing anything other than assisting the team

replies.body: Sure thing bud, nice frame of mind
